content:
Starting a new thread to continue the discussion from #PR reviews > #29602 Infinite conditional sums API , since development work has shifted to a new PR using the optional-parameter mechanism.

This PR is now ready for review, but it's a bit on the long side – motivated by @Sébastien Gouëzel 's observation that summation filters could give a "subtype-free" way to work with tsums over subsets, I couldn't resist developing some theory of map / comap operations for summation filters, and that bumps up the length a bit.
